contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Officeholder |name = Júlio Prestes |image = Retrato Júlio Prestes.jpg |imagesize = 155px |caption = |order = [[President of Brazil|President-elect of Brazil]] |term = elected March 1, 1930 |vicepresident = [[Vital Soares]] (elect) |predecessor = [[Washington Luís]] |successor = [[Getúlio Vargas]] |order2 = [[List of Governors of São Paulo|Governor of São Paulo]] |term_start2 = July 14, 1927 |term_end2 = October 24, 1930 |predecessor2 = [[Carlos de Campos]] |successor2 = [[Pedro Manuel de Toledo]] |birth_date = March 15, 1882 |birth_place = [[Itapetininga]], [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]], [[Brazilian Empire]] |death_date = {{Death date and age|1946|2|9|1882|3|15}} |death_place = [[São Paulo]], [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]], Brazil |constituency = |party = |spouse = |children = |profession = |religion = |signature = |footnotes = }} '''Júlio Prestes de Albuquerque''' (March 15, 1882 – February 9, 1946) was a Brazilian politician. Governor of [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo state]] in 1926, he was elected [[president of Brazil]] on March 1, 1930, but never took office because the government was overthrown in the [[Revolution of 1930]] that brought [[Getúlio Vargas]] to power, three weeks before Prestes' scheduled inauguration on November 15, 1930. {{S-start}} {{s-gov}} {{Succession box|title=[[List of Governors of São Paulo|Governor of São Paulo]]|years=1927–1929|before=[[Carlos de Campos]]|after=[[Pedro Manuel de Toledo]]}} {{S-end}} {{SãoPauloGovernors}} {{Presidents_of_Brazil}} {{Authority control|VIAF=33366103}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Prestes, Julio | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = President of Brazil | DATE OF BIRTH =March 15, 1882 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Itapetininga]], [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]], [[Brazilian Empire]] | DATE OF DEATH =February 9, 1946 | PLACE OF DEATH = [[São Paulo]], [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]], Brazil }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Prestes, Julio}} [[Category:1882 births]] [[Category:1946 deaths]] [[Category:People from São Paulo (state)]] [[Category:Governors of São Paulo (state)]] [[Category:Presidents of Brazil]] [[Category:University of São Paulo alumni]] [[Category:Brazilian people of Portuguese descent]] {{Brazil-politician-stub}}
